702130f-a.text:
Westchester Ave. (left, where elevated structure is seen), east side, north from Waters Ave. to Middletown Road, showing the swampy meadow bounded on the right by Appleton Ave, and in the foreground by Eaat Tremont Ave. (not seen). The elevated structure is that of the
I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702130f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Waters Avenue, Bronx, NY
